title: What I did today - 7th May
author: Niharika (Bug reporting system)
content:
Okay, so, college assignments and lab files aside, today I tried to run TimVideos streaming-system module on my laptop. It took me a while to realize that I was working with a more recent version of Django than the one the streaming-system works with. Tasks for tomorrow:

  • Install Django version 1.5
  • Run the streaming-system module
Originally posted on Niharika Kohli
